amendment.description: To prohibit the enforcement of the ban on travel to Cuba.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1900 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1900 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 59. Record Vote Number: 405.
Amendment SA 1900 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S13079-13087; text: CR S13079) To prohibit the enforcement of the ban on travel to Cuba.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1900 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1900 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 59. Record Vote Number: 405.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1900 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
